DOC.brief_title: Talent Aortic Cuff Stent Graft System Compassionate Use Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose registry provide endovascular mean treatment patient experience sub-optimal outcome relate implanted AneuRx bifurcate stent graft deem suitable candidate treatment AneuRx Aortic Cuff . A sub-optimal outcome define either Type I Type III endoleak and/or inadequate seal zone ( < 1 cm ) . For Registry purpose , Type III endoleak define proximal modular endoleak .
DOC.criteria: Patient > = 18 year age Patient serious disease condition No generally acceptable alternative treat patient available Patient AneuRx stent graft system implant > = 30 day Patient suboptimal outcome AneuRx stent graft system evidence one following : Type I endoleak Type III endoleak ( Proximal , modular ) Loss seal zone Proximal aortic neck diameter > = 14mm < = 30mm Angle axis suprarenal aorta aneurysm neck < = 60 degree Patient able willing available 12,24,26,48 60 month postprocedure Patient pregnant lactate Arterial access cross delivery system Excessive vessel tortuosity Excessive aortic calcification AneuRx stent graft system implant within last 30 day
